name: Bort and Squash
description: Bort wrangling a serpent-like sqash from a clients late season veggie garden.

name: Patio Container Garden
description: This urban patio has been packed to the brim with plants, strategically placed to maximize lighting and plant happiness.

name: Deck Planter
description: Large custom built planters adorn this suburban deck, which hosts a mix of perennial herbs, lettuces, and pollinator-friendly species.

name: Urban Pollinator Garden
description: This parially barren and trash-filled urban plot transformed into a lush, pollinator friendly oasis in less than a year!
